title: SDD Unified Feature Specification
description: A machine-readable specification for a feature, including metadata, functional, and non-functional requirements.

featureId.description: A unique identifier for the feature (e.g., 'auth-001').

title.description: A human-readable title for the feature.

description.description: A brief summary of the feature.

performance.description: Performance targets (e.g., 'API endpoints must respond in <200ms p95').

security.description: Security constraints and requirements (e.g., 'All passwords must be hashed using bcrypt').

scalability.description: Scalability targets (e.g., 'The system must handle 10,000 concurrent users').

functionalRequirements.description: A list of functional requirements for the feature.

id.description: A unique identifier for the functional requirement (e.g., 'FR-001').

description.description: A clear, concise description of the requirement.

acceptanceCriteria.description: A list of specific, testable criteria that must be met for the requirement to be considered complete.
